gpt_comment: [FULL] All accessible sources align with the baseline: sunny weather in Paris, no rain and an average temperature of 24.0°C. Meteoblue suggests a slightly higher temperature range of 27.2-29.4°C but this is not material. A perfect day for a leisurely stroll around Montmartre, as long as you're not a donkey, who might find it a bit too warm.
